text:
@realDonaldTrump malaria drug widely touted BY #CRMINALdickTator {aka tRump} 
 for treating the new coronavirus showed no benefit in a large analysis of its use in U.S. veterans hospitals. There were more deaths among those given hydroxychloroquine versus standard care,
